posts.title: 奶昔相册1
posts.text: var image_list = [ "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20230204163945.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20231009125747.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20231009010940.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20231009010922.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20231001204720.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20230930181301.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20230715193319.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20230714230827.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20230205185919.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221201182039.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221130214602.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221005175012.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220826141557.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220802223752.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220709124248.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220701170412.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220627122645.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220625192224.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220624193221.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220508134914.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20220404192814.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221213183712.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221213160029.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221212224316.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221212224310.jpg", "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221207191322.jpg" ]; var cover_path = "https://bbm-img-store-1.oss-cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/naixi/IMG20221213183712.jpg" + "?x-oss-process=image/resize,m_lfit,w_200/quality,q_90"; // var cover_path = image_list[0] + "?x-oss-process=image/auto-orient,1/resize,m_lfit,w_200/quality,q_90"; var div = document.querySelector('#album_cover'); var _path = window.location.pathname; if (_path == "/") { let image_path = cover_path; // let image_path = "../../../../images/name.jpg"; image_path = image_path.replace("name", `img (1)`); let html_str = " \ \ "; html_str = html_str.replace("image_path", image_path); let image_cover = "images"; image_cover = image_cover.replace("images", html_str); div.innerHTML = image_cover; } else { let loop = image_list.length; let images = ""; for (let i = 0; i < loop; i++) { let quality = "?x-oss-process=image/quality,q_60"; let image_path = image_list[i] + quality; var text = " \ \ "; // var text = "" text = text.replace("image_path", image_path); // text = text.replace("标题", ""); // text = text.replace("日期", ""); images += text; } let album = "images"; album = album.replace("images", images); div.innerHTML = album; }

posts.title: Hello World
posts.excerpt: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
